review: Movies I ordered did not yet play.If I want to watch a movie, I have to start playing it,pause it so it can load other wise it keeps buffering. Also I guess I don't know how to go back to a movie once I take a look at what else there is. review: Funny thing is some of the apps don't work properly.  For example Bloomberg and PBS, on Bloomberg the live broadcast keeps crashing until I reset to factory setting and re-installed everything again...So time consuming, then it works a couple days maybe a week and crashes again...PBS just crashes randomly, This seems like compatibility issues with Amazon TV vs app issues like I see most people blaming (I only say that because you have to reset the Amazon Box to resolve the issue!
